DOC.brief_summary: This pilot study sub-study ATN 067 . ATN 067 utilizes cross-sectional research design recruit Latina African American young woman undergo HIV screening . The primary goal propose pilot study , ATN 084 , explore feasibility acceptability index female recruiter identify recruit past present male sexual partner undergo HIV screen complete one-time ACASI interview . In addition , study also include female friendship network member enrol ATN 067 diagnose HIV . These young woman also ask recruit past present male sex partner undergo HIV screening .
DOC.criteria: Inclusion Criteria 084 Index Recruiters : 1 ) Completed participation currently enrol index recruiter ATN 067 2 ) Is female friendship network member enrol ATN 067 diagnose HIV infected participation ATN 067 study ; Aged 18 year old time consent ; Willing recruit least one , six past current male sexual partner willing discuss consider HIV screening . A male sexual partner include individual index recruiter engage least one episode oral , vaginal anal sex course lifetime ; Able understand write spoken English ; Willing provide write informed consent/assent . Exclusion Criteria 084 Index Recruiters : Selfreport pregnancy enrollment ( pregnancy test require ) ; Untreated psychiatric disorder associate thought disorder , hallucination acute substance use withdrawal . Stabilized patient receive appropriate psychiatric care exclude informed consent reasonably assume ; Visibly distraught and/or visibly emotionally unstable ( e.g. , depressive mood exhibit manic , suicidal , violent behavior ) ; Active drug alcohol use dependence , opinion site personnel , would interfere ability give true informed consent adhere study requirement ; Acute illness , opinion treat clinician , would interfere participant 's ability adhere protocol requirement and/or interfere protocol objective . Inclusion Criteria Male Sexual Partners : Is bear male ; Aged 18 year old time consent ; Identified male sexual partner index recruiter enrol ATN 067 ( vaginal and/or anal sexual intercourse past ) ; Willing complete sociodemographic behavioral risk assessment survey ; Willing discus consider HIV screening ; Able understand write spoken English ; Willing provide write informed consent/assent . Exclusion Criteria Male Sexual Partners : Untreated psychiatric disorder associate thought disorder , hallucination , and/or acute substance use withdrawal . Stabilized patient receive appropriate psychiatric care exclude informed consent reasonably assume ; Visibly distraught and/or visibly emotionally unstable ( e.g. , depressive mood exhibit manic , suicidal , violent behavior ) ; Active drug alcohol use dependence , opinion site personnel , would interfere ability give true informed consent adhere study requirement ; Acute illness , opinion treat clinician , would interfere participant 's ability adhere protocol requirement and/or interfere protocol objective .
